set output '18.png'
set multiplot layout 1,1 rowsfirst title "PSO after 18 steps"
set xlabel 'dimension 0'
set ylabel 'dimension 1'
set xrange [-254.96236431295:200]

set grid
set arrow from -100,-100 to 100,-100 nohead
